note:
Husband unto @GypsumFantastic‬. Trying to be nice & get good karma but it’s not always easy. Gobshite ninja; relentless optimist; walking; thinking; drone flight; books; gardening; & blethering. Tired of most people; hope you’re better than them. #MorningDogWalkFeatured

Avatar is a hand drawn strange clown-like figure holding a sign reading “Big Gay Shaun”.

Header is a sunny early August morning with fluffy white clouds in a blue sky over a Wiltshire village with trees & fields.

fields.name: Please don’t be awful, you’re better than that.
fields.value: I cannot stress this enough - wilful stupidity is NOT attractive. The 1990’s and early 2000’s lied to your face.
